title: Le Pain quotidien - Tongres
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Mediterranean, Take-out, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Belgian-based international restaurant chain featuring fresh artisan bakery and communal table. Each section of the menu includes at least one vegan option, labeled on the menu (e.g. rice milk porridge for breakfast, cashew cheese, vegan brunch).
